title: Scheduled myki maintenance
articleContent:
We're upgrading the myki system to improve payment card security. You won't be able to access your myki account or top up online from 12:15am to 5am Saturday 22 June while we make improvements.

During the system upgrade, you can top up your myki card at:

  • hundreds of shops including 7-Eleven within the myki boundary
  • myki machines at selected stations and stops
  • premium station ticket offices

Find your nearest place to top up.
